vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to increase the service contract with Sigma Surveillance, Inc. dba STS360 for the purchase and installation of hardware and software for a video surveillance camera system managed by the Department of Information and Technology Services - Not to exceed $4,081,988.85, from $16,327,955.38 to $20,409,944.23 - Financing: General Fund ($509,400.00), Data Services Fund ($3,572,588.85) to be reimbursed by December 2023 from the Master Lease Equipment Fund ($3,237,398.99) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to increase the service contract with Sigma Surveillance, Inc. dba STS360 for the purchase and installation of hardware and software for a video surveillance camera system managed by the Department of Information and Technology Services - Not to exceed $4,081,988.85, from $16,327,955.38 to $20,409,944.23 - Financing: General Fund ($509,400.00), Data Services Fund ($3,572,588.85) to be reimbursed by December 2023 from the Master Lease Equipment Fund ($3,237,398.99) (subject to annual appropriations)
